name: an-otter-wiki
description: OtterWiki is a lightweight self-hosted wiki engine with a modern UI and Git-based storage. It supports Markdown, version control, and collaborative editing with user access controls.
features: Markdown Support: Write and edit pages using Markdown syntax with live preview and syntax highlighting.
Git Integration: Store all content in Git repositories with automatic version control and change tracking.
Modern Interface: Clean, responsive web interface optimized for both desktop and mobile editing experiences.
User Management: Control access with user accounts, permissions, and role-based editing capabilities.
Page History: View complete revision history with diff comparisons and easy rollback to previous versions.
Search Functionality: Find content quickly with full-text search across all wiki pages and attachments.
File Attachments: Upload and manage images, documents, and other files with automatic linking and organization.
Collaborative Editing: Enable multiple users to edit and contribute content with conflict resolution and merge capabilities.
Custom Themes: Customize appearance with themes and CSS modifications to match organizational branding.
Export Options: Export wiki content to various formats including PDF, HTML, and Markdown for offline use.
Lightweight Design: Run efficiently with minimal resource requirements, perfect for small teams and personal use.
Plugin System: Extend functionality with plugins for additional features like diagrams, charts, and integrations.
